text: Salice-Veglie is a railway station in Salice Salentino, Italy. The station is on the Martina Franca-Lecce railway. The train services are operated by Ferrovie del Sud Est. ==Train services== The station is served by:FSE train timetables *Local services (Treno regionale) Martina Franca - Francavilla Fontana - Novoli - Lecce ==References== Category:Railway stations in Apulia Category:Buildings and structures in the Province of Lecce
title: Salice-Veglie railway station
